The course rating is 0 and it has a slope rating of 0. The estimated green fees for 18 holes is $55. Designed by Bill Murray, the Kings Gate golf course opened in  2006. Estimated Green Fees $55 These rates are an estimate of what you might expect to pay at Kings Gate with a cart. Actual rates may vary. Fees are typically lowest Monday through Thursday and during twilight (late afternoon and evenings). Expect to pay the highest rates on weekends. About Us - The Gate Golf Club Skip to primary navigation Skip to main content Donate The Gate Golf Club Home About Us About Us The Course Practice Complex Donate Building the Vision Meet the Team Board of Directors Project Partners First Tee – Naples/Collier Career Opportunities Contact Us Contact Us Press Room FAQ About Us Opening in 2026, The Gate Golf Club will bring a fresh perspective to the golfing community in Naples, Florida. Led by a passionate team of local Neapolitans, this non-profit organization is driven by a shared love for golf and a commitment to creating a lasting impact on the community. Recognizing the limited availability of public golf courses in Southwest Florida, The Gate Golf Club is dedicated to making the sport more accessible and inclusive for families, children, and players of all skill levels. Here, guests will have the opportunity to learn and enjoy the game in a relaxed, welcoming environment. Our state-of-the-art practice facilities, complete with covered hitting bays, ensure players can sharpen their skills day or night, rain or shine. The Gate Golf Club will also be home to a modern restaurant and a community-focused Pavilion, offering spaces for gathering, dining, and enjoying the scenic surroundings. The Gate Golf Club is proud to support First Tee – Naples/Collier, a non-profit organization that teaches juniors important life skills, character, and values through golf. As the future headquarters of First Tee – Naples/Collier, we are committed to fostering a love for the game while inspiring the next generation. At the heart of The Gate Golf Club will be our dynamic 9-hole, par-35 course designed by legendary golfer Peter Jacobsen. Featuring top-tier TifEagle putting greens and Celebration Bermuda fairways, the course will offer a premier experience for golfers of all levels. Our cutting-edge driving range will feature 30 covered hitting bays outfitted with comfortable lounge seating and Trackman technology, providing an unparalleled practice environment. For an added challenge, players can enjoy an illuminated, 18-hole Himalayas-style putting course, making practice and play enjoyable day and night. Dining will be elevated with the Oakwood Grill, a 175-seat casual restaurant offering an upscale menu inspired by the flavors of Southwest Florida. Open-air wraparound seating will provide stunning views of the Himalayas putting green, Hole #9, and a tranquil water feature, creating the perfect backdrop for a memorable meal. The Gate Golf Club will be more than just a golf course—it will be a vibrant community hub where golf enthusiasts and newcomers alike can connect, improve their game, and make lasting memories. Join us in 2026 as we open the doors to an exciting new chapter in Naples’ golfing tradition. Page Footer About Us Privacy Policy The Gate Golf Club opens to the public in  2026! Contact Email: info@thegategolf.org Facebook Instagram Copyright © 2025 The Gate Golf Club All Rights Reserved.
